name: study
description: The study or publication that the perturbation data is associated with

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the study/publication

fields.name: system
fields.description: The name of the system that the study is registered in

fields.name: uri
fields.description: A Universal Record Identifier (URI) to the study or publication

fields.name: date
fields.description: The date the study was released or published

fields.name: authors
fields.description: The authors of the study

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The name of the author

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The last name of the author

fields.name: primary
fields.description: Whether the author is the primary author

name: experiment
description: The experimental details of the perturbation

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the experiment

fields.name: summary
fields.description: A summary of the experiment

fields.name: num_perturbed_cells
fields.description: The number of cells perturbed in the experiment: 15000, 50000, etc.

fields.name: num_variants
fields.description: The number of variants in the library: 300

fields.name: coverage
fields.description: The number of cells per variant: 20, 100

fields.name: treatments
fields.description: A list of treatments applied to the model system

fields.name: timepoints
fields.description: A list of timepoints at which the perturbation was performed

fields.name: replicates
fields.description: Type of replicates performed: biological, technical, biological+technical, none

fields.name: library_generation_type
fields.description: The type of perturbation method: endogenous, exogenous

fields.name: perturbation_details
fields.description: Details of the perturbation

fields.name: endogenous_perturbation
fields.description: Endogenous perturbation details

fields.name: library_generation_method
fields.description: Enzyme used for the perturbation: Cas9, Cas12a, etc.

fields.name: mechanism
fields.description: The mechanism of the perturbation: nuclease, base editor, prime editor.

fields.name: enzyme_delivery_method
fields.description: The method used to deliver the enzyme for the perturbation: lentivirus, electroporation, etc.

fields.name: library_delivery_method
fields.description: The method used to deliver the library for the perturbation: lentivirus, electroporation, etc.

fields.name: enzyme_integration_state
fields.description: The final genomic state of the enzyme: native locus replacement, extra-local insertion, random integration, episomal, non-integrated plasmid, RNA

fields.name: library_integration_state
fields.description: The final genomic state of the sgRNA library: native locus replacement, extra-local insertion, random integration, episomal, non-integrated plasmid, RNA

fields.name: enzyme_expression_control
fields.description: Expression control mechanism of the enzyme: constitutive, inducible, native promoter

fields.name: library_expression_control
fields.description: Expression control mechanism of the sgRNA library: constitutive, inducible, native promoter

fields.name: exogenous_perturbation
fields.description: Exogenous perturbation details

fields.name: library_generation_method
fields.description: Method for exogenous library generation: oligo-directed mutagenic PCR, error-prone PCR.

fields.name: library_delivery_method
fields.description: The method used to deliver the library for the perturbation: lentivirus, electroporation, etc.

fields.name: library_integration_state
fields.description: The final genomic state of the library: native locus replacement, extra-local insertion, random integration, episomal, non-integrated plasmid, RNA

fields.name: library_expression_control
fields.description: Expression control mechanism: constitutive, inducible, native promoter

fields.name: target_details
fields.description: Details of the target of the perturbation

fields.name: target_name
fields.description: Target name

fields.name: target_ensembl_id
fields.description: The Ensembl ID of the target

fields.name: target_refseq_id
fields.description: The RefSeq ID of the target

fields.name: target_uniprot_id
fields.description: The UniProt ID of the target

fields.name: target_category
fields.description: The type of target: coding, intronic, non-coding regulatory, etc.

fields.name: target_sequence_dna
fields.description: Target DNA sequence

fields.name: target_sequence_protein
fields.description: Target protein sequence

fields.name: target_sequence_rna
fields.description: Target RNA sequence

fields.name: model_system_details
fields.description: Details of the model system used in the perturbation

fields.name: model_system
fields.description: The model system used in the perturbation experiment: cell line, primary cell, organoid, etc.

fields.name: model_system_species
fields.description: The species of the model system: Human, Mouse, etc.

fields.name: model_system_tissue
fields.description: The tissue of the model system: breast, brain, etc.

fields.name: model_system_cell_type
fields.description: The cell type of the model system: epithelial, neuronal, etc.

fields.name: model_system_name
fields.description: The name of the model system, such as a cell line

fields.name: model_system_sex
fields.description: The sex of the model system: Male, Female, Unknown

fields.name: model_system_age
fields.description: The age of the model system: Embryonic, Neonatal, Adult, Aged, Unknown

fields.name: model_system_genetic_background
fields.description: The genetic background of the model system: C57BL6, BALBc, etc.

fields.name: cell_passage_number
fields.description: The number of passages the cells have undergone: 12, 33, etc.

fields.name: assay_details
fields.description: Details of the assay used in the experiment

fields.name: readout_dimensionality
fields.description: The readout complexity: single-dimensional, higher-dimensional.

fields.name: readout_type
fields.description: The readout type: Transcriptomic, Proteomic, Phenotypic, etc.

fields.name: readout_technology
fields.description: The technology used for the readout: flow-cytometry, survival assay etc.

fields.name: method_name
fields.description: The name of the assay used in the experiment: VAMP-seq, etc.

fields.name: method_uri
fields.description: A Universal Record Identifier (URI) to the method used in the experiment: https://www.protocols.io/view/cite-seq-5qpvo4rxg4o1/v1

fields.name: sequencing_strategy
fields.description: The sequencing strategy used in the experiment: direct, shotgun or barcode sequencing

fields.name: sequencing_read_configuration
fields.description: The configuration of sequencing reads: single-segment (short read), single-segment (long read), or multi-segment

fields.name: sequencing_platform
fields.description: The sequencing platform used in the experiment: Illumina NovaSeq 6000, PacBio RSII, Oxford Nanopore MinION MJ1B, etc

fields.name: software_counts
fields.description: The software used for counting reads: Enrich2.

fields.name: software_analysis
fields.description: The software used for analysis: Enrich2.

fields.name: system
fields.description: The name of the system that the dataset is registered in: GEO, SRA, website, publication, etc.

fields.name: accession
fields.description: The accession number of the dataset: GSE139313 etc.

fields.name: uri
fields.description: A Universal Record Identifier (URI) to the dataset: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/view/PRJNA579227

fields.name: description
fields.description: A brief description of the dataset: Raw sequencing data; Processed data; etc.

fields.name: ontology_system
fields.description: The name of the ontology system: EFO, MONDO, etc.

fields.name: ontology_id
fields.description: The ontology ID of the disease or biological process: EFO_0000616, MONDO_0004979

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the disease or biological process: breast cancer, Alzheimer's disease
